backend/analytics.mo: Defines analytics types and a `calculateAnalytics` function that iterates unsold inventory items to compute total inventory value, piece count, and counts by transaction type (sale, purchase, returned).
backend/main.mo: Main actor for the jewellery stock manager backend, exposing shared functions to add items, batch-add items, and record transactions, while maintaining maps for items, transactions, and customers with full analytics aggregation.
backend/migration.mo: Data migration module that transforms old actor state (using `#returned` item type) to new state (using `#purchaseReturn` and `#salesReturn`), mapping all items, transactions, and customer records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three implemented features: fixing backend analytics to show real dashboard values, splitting the Returns card into Purchase/Sales Returns cards, and applying the correct stock formula across Dashboard and StockView pages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated summary file describing the purpose and key changes of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point that imports Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, setting the page title to 'Jewellery Stock Manager' and mounting the React root via `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with routes for Dashboard, Sales, Purchases, Returns, StockView, Customers, and Factory pages, all wrapped in a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/BarcodeScanner.t: A camera-based barcode/QR scanner component that uses the `useQRScanner` hook to capture scans, parses results via `parseScannerString`, and calls `onItemScanned` with valid parsed items.
frontend/src/components/CodeChartTabs.ts: Displays jewellery items grouped by 2-character code prefixes in a grid; allows drilling into a prefix to select items and accumulates selections with weight/piece totals before confirming.
frontend/src/components/ExcelUploader.ts: A drag-and-drop/file-input component that loads the XLSX library lazily, parses uploaded Excel or CSV files row-by-row using `parseScannerString`, and returns valid `ParsedItem` results via `onItemsParsed`.
frontend/src/components/FilteredStockVie: Shows a filtered list of jewellery items for a given code prefix using `StockTable` with row selection, and provides a button to add selected items to a parent selection via `onAddToSelection`.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell component rendering a sticky header with the JewelTrack brand, a responsive navigation bar (desktop and mobile) linking to all main routes, a main content area, and a footer.
A form for manually entering a jewellery item's code, gross/stone/net weights, and piece count with validation, calling `onItemAdded` with a `ParsedItem` on successful submission.
frontend/src/components/ReportDownloader: A dropdown button component that exports report data as either a CSV or tab-delimited text file, with optional column mapping support.
frontend/src/components/StockSelector.ts: A stock item selection UI with search, prefix-based tabs, and a summary panel showing totals for selected items, triggering a callback on confirmation.
frontend/src/components/StockTable.tsx: A sortable, searchable table for displaying jewellery stock items with optional row selection via click and Ctrl+click.
frontend/src/components/TransactionPrevi: A preview and editing interface for parsed transaction items that validates weight equations, supports inline edits/deletes, and submits confirmed items via batch mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/TransactionTotal: Displays transactions grouped by date with date-range filtering, collapsible day rows, summary totals, and an optional CSV/text export button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions and status flags. Includes an `InternetIdentityProvider` component that persists identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including analytics, stock, transactions, customers, and factory ledger. Mutations invalidate relevant query caches on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Sora fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme tokens including colors, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` into the DOM root.
frontend/src/pages/Customers.tsx: Customers page that lists all customers in tabs, displays their sales and return transaction history filtered by an optional date range, and shows aggregate totals for weight and pieces.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page that fetches analytics data and displays stat cards for current stock, sales, purchases, purchase returns, and sales returns with navigation links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/Factory.tsx: Displays a factory ledger page with summary cards (transaction count, gross weight, net weight, pieces) and a detailed table of factory transactions fetched via useFactoryLedger hook.
frontend/src/pages/Purchases.tsx: Purchases page that allows recording jewellery purchase transactions via Excel upload, manual entry, or barcode scan, and displays purchase history with totals.
frontend/src/pages/Returns.tsx: Returns page supporting both sales returns and purchase returns, with input via Excel, manual entry, or scanner, and a transaction preview/history view.
frontend/src/pages/Sales.tsx: Sales page for recording jewellery sales with optional customer name, supporting Excel upload, manual entry, barcode scan, and stock selection, plus sales history display.
frontend/src/pages/StockView.tsx: Displays live unsold inventory with summary cards for items, gross weight, net weight, and pieces computed from analytics data, plus a stock table and report downloader.
frontend/src/utils/scannerParser.ts: Parses raw barcode scanner strings into structured jewellery item data (code, gross weight, stone weight, net weight, pieces) using step-by-step extraction and integer-based decimal math for validation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom CSS-variable-based colors, fonts (Inter/Sora), border radii, box shadows, keyframe animations, and plugins (tailwindcss-animate, typography, container-queries).
project_state.json: Project state metadata for JewelTrack, an inventory management app, documenting version, architectural notes (stock formula), known issues (dashboard zeros, incorrect stock summary), existing features, and pending fix requests (AR-1 through AR-3).
